titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2354) making appropriations for energy and water development and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2012, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 112-135, by Mr. Webster.

All points of order against consideration of the bill are waived. The bill shall be considered for amendment under the five-minute rule. Points of order against provisions in the bill for failure to comply with clause 2 of rule XXI are waived.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 50.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 337.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 7/6/2011--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2354) making appropriations for energy and water development and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2012.
